name: Dodge
text: Your training and reflexes allow you to react swiftly to avoid an opponents' attacks.
benefit: You gain a +1 dodge bonus to your AC. A condition that makes you lose your Dex bonus to AC also makes you lose the benefits of this feat.
staminaText: When you move your speed or farther, you can spend a number of stamina points up to double your Dexterity bonus. If you do, until the start of your next turn, you gain an increase to the dodge bonus granted by the Dodge feat equal to half the number of stamina points you spent.
mythicText: When focused, you become nearly impossible to strike.
mythicBenefit: The bonus to AC from Dodge increases by 1. As an immediate action, you can expend one use of mythic power to grant yourself an additional +10 dodge bonus to AC against one attack.
text_zh: 你的训练和反应令你能够迅速闪避攻击。
benefit_zh: 你可以在AC上获得+1闪避加值。若你失去AC的敏捷加值时，也会同时失去此专长的加值。
mythicText_zh: 当你注意力集中的时候，是几乎不可能被打中的。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你的闪避专长给AC带来的加值增加1点。以直觉动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，来使你自己在对抗1次攻击时，AC获得额外+10点闪避加值。
staminaText_zh: 如果你移动了自己的移动速度或更远的距离，你可花费最多等同2倍你敏捷加值的耐力点数，这样的话直到你下次回合开始，你获得等同所消耗耐力值一半的AC闪避加值。
